com.netflix.spectator.api

Interface RegistryConfig


  • public interface RegistryConfig
    Configuration settings for the registry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String get(String k)
      Get the value associated with a key.
      default int maxNumberOfMeters()
      For classes based on AbstractRegistry this setting is used to determine the maximum number of registered meters permitted.
      default boolean propagateWarnings()
      Should an exception be thrown for warnings?

    • Method Detail

      • get

        String get(String k)
        Get the value associated with a key.
        Parameters:
        k - Key to lookup in the config.
        Returns:
        Value for the key or null if no key is present.

      • propagateWarnings

        default boolean propagateWarnings()
        Should an exception be thrown for warnings?

      • maxNumberOfMeters

        default int maxNumberOfMeters()
        For classes based on AbstractRegistry this setting is used to determine the maximum number of registered meters permitted. This limit is used to help protect the system from a memory leak if there is a bug or irresponsible usage of registering meters.
        Returns:
        Maximum number of distinct meters that can be registered at a given time. The default is Integer.MAX_VALUE.
